comment: Dr. Chenaz Seelarbokus has a wealth of knowledge that helped guide the students through this online course. She was extremely professional conducting classes from a remote environment.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Inspirational--Respected

comment: Great professor over all. The lectures were very interesting and fascinating. She responds fast if you need anything. I did enjoy this class. Be ready to interview an organization, I will recommend doing this project paper as soon as you can get it done. You will have fun looking for organizations to interview.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Inspirational

comment: Dr. Seelarbokus was great. Just keep with the readings and quizzes. It is a lot, so plan ahead. Major term paper, but its easy. Just do the work and you'll pass.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: No textbook was required. Instead we read articles. About 4 articles to read per week. This is an International Affairs degree, at the 4xxx level. Expect to read. There were practice quizzes to take before the actual weekly quiz. There are two exams, midterm and the last exam. There is a paper to write. Try writing little by little on your paper.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: There is ALOT of reading. But overall as long as you do the readings you will be fine. She is a great professor and very informative. Watch the lectures.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Lecture heavy

comment: Very easy and straightforward.  Quick to answer emails and is lenient.  One 10-page paper, weekly quizzes and 2 tests but everything is open note.  Highly recommenced this class and teacher!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: She is the best at KSU

Awesome professor, very understanding. Just be sure to meet the deadlines and communicate. I highly recommend taking her. Assignments were easy, really long paper at the end but highly doable. Very Interesting class as well.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Great professor, gives really good material for the readings and it is all very interesting! Most of the grade composed of weekly quizzes, only one test and one paper. She definitely cares for students to learn from real world situations and useful concepts!
rating_tags: Inspirational--Caring--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Seelarbokus is great. She is knowledgeable and knows how to relay the information to the students. She also gives timely and relevant feedback. The class requires a lot of reading, and there are weekly deliverables.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This course was easy! Weekly quizzes ,two exams, and a final paper due athe end of semester. Dr. Seelarbokus always responded to my emails in a timely manner. Clear objectives set and easy to navigate onlie material.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Online Savvy

comment: This is my second class with Professor Seelarbokus, as I thoroughly enjoyed my first class with her. She chooses great readings to incorporate into each lecture and provides links to them so you don't have to waste money on a textbook. Quizzes every week, with a midterm, final, and semester long research paper. Clear guidelines and timely grader.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Dr. Seelarbokus is great! She is willing to help and gives great feedback. This course did require a lot of reading, but everything was posted on time each week giving you ample time to complete the work. I would take a course with her again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Professor is really straight forward, weekly quizzes based on readings are pretty easy. Loved the professor, would take it again
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Very well structured online class. However, it is based upon a lot of different readings with quizzes based on them so get ready to read. Midterm and final were just questions from previous quizzes so not too bad. The final paper is manageable and she provides great feedback. She is a very understanding professor as well and responsive.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Yes online with face-to-face feelings. The structure, the teaching style, the timely feedback, and everything made the experience very satisfying and rewarding: Well-selected readings, very engaging lectures, and a practical skills-oriented paper. Above all, Dr. Seelarbokus is always accessible, helpful, caring, encouraging, and very knowledgeable.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures

comment: I throughly enjoyed being in Dr. Seelarbokus class. She is very detailed and the coursework was very well organized. Dr. Seelarbokus always responded quickly to every email I sent her. I couldnt have asked for a more caring professor that wanted me to be successful in her class. She was very good in offering constructive feedback. Thank you
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Inspirational--Caring

comment: Very reading intensive, but definitely worth it! Dr. Seelarbokus is a great professor and does a good job of breaking down the reading so it can be better understood. I have taken her twice now and have not regretted it once. All the assignments and expectations of you are put forth early on in the class, so you are never guessing where you stand.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Get ready to read

comment: Amazing professor, always responds to emails quickly. Weekly quizzes with lots of reading but they are always easy. Super long research paper at the end but she is kind with her grading. Easy to make an A and requires no studying.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: She is so nice! Gave excellent and prompt feedbacks compared to other professors. Her class was never hard, weekly readings and quizzes on them each week. Midterm and final questions were all from the quizzes. I would take her again if I can
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Get ready to read

comment: Readings are long must read them to pass the weekly quizzes.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Great online. Her lectures are straightforward and tests reflect the modules. You have weekly practice quizzes, graded quizzes, midterm, final, and research paper. I appreciate her thoroughness in providing guidelines, it makes the work much easier. If you TRY you will easily get an A. Just put forth the effort and Dr. S will make sure you succeed
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy

comment: She is helpful and respond to email queries quickly. She is a nice professor and treats everyone equally.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Accessible outside class

comment: Great Professor! I had her for my internship and she was very helpful throughout the semester. I would request her next time!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Prof Seelarbokus was awesome. This class was very informative and eye-opening. I would absolutely recommend taking her! Stay on top of you weekly readings/ lectures and you will do well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: She is easily accessible and answers mail, provides feedback and grading instructions, friendly and sees equally everyone. Research paper is very helpful in learning practical skills as well as communication skills.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: I really enjoyed taking this class with Dr. Seelarbokus. Anytime I had a question I could expect a response with a couple of hours and she was always very helpful. She is such a great professor who wants to help you succeed as long as you put the work in. Make sure to do the readings and view the lectures and you will get an A. 10/10 recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: This was a really interesting class. As long as you keep up with the readings and lectures you'll do fine. There are even practice quizzes before each quiz to gage your understanding of the material. Dr Seelarbokus is such a nice person and willing to work with you. You can tell she is very passionate about the material. Would highly recommend!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: The class itself is fairly straightforward, but she is terrible. Constantly changing due dates days before the assignment/quiz is originally due and readings she assigns are rarely accessible. She is all over the place, unorganized, and ignores concerns. Half way through the class and desperately wishing she was more capable.

There is one 400 word minimum discussion post assignment per week, an online quiz every few weeks as well. But you do need to do the readings because she can be a harsh grader on the discussion posts. A midterm and a final and no paper at all so its really simple. It was an easy A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Painless. No book required; 500 word weekly discussion posts where you essentially summarize the main ideas of the week's readings. Don't need to reply to anyone else. Readings came from books; some you had to access through KSU library supersearch. 2 quizzes each 10%, 3rd quiz and final each 20%, 8 weekly discussion posts each 5%. Take her!

The midterm and final were just the practice quizzes put together. Don't need a book, easy class, she is very specific about what she wants. Online discussion post every week, 2 quizzes, midterm, final and a paper. There are practice quizzes for every lesson, very easy A. definitely recommend
I loved this class, and Dr. S, Strongly recommend taking her!
Great Class!
I enjoyed my PAD 7100 class! Dr. Seelarbokus is an awesome professor! I wish I could have another class with her again.

Great professor. Online class was interesting. I didn't find it to be too challenging and the readings were not too lengthy. Very nice lady, I will take her again if I get the chance. Make sure you have the discipline to stay on top of your coursework for her class though. NO TEXT BOOK, ALL ONLINE READINGS!

If u take this class be ready to read a lot of articles,that is the beauty of this course,there's no text book to limit u.All the articles are very helpful & give u a lot more info & insight.The class discussions were fun & the lecturer knows her work very well.She is very helpful,you'll not regret,i would take her again in a heartbeat.Thanks Prof!

She is not clear about the short or essay questions on her examinations, it is not clear what she is looking for in an answer.  She does not have a clear grading system.  Beware of the Research Project, good luck in fulfilling her requirements.  Will not take her for another class.
Online: Extremely helpful; however, she's not clear on what she wants for short answers on midterm. Weekly discussions and quizzes, or self-assessments. Two major tests.

Every Professor is this helpfull college would be the best experience of our lives. She is there anytime you need her. She guides me and assists my learning process. The class is maybe special topic, but her teaching makes it very interesting. I heard very great comments about her everywhere. If you are in IA. She is your teacher and conselor.

Sweet lady. She wants you to do well. Took her hybrid class.  Class is VERY boring. Attendance required.  Midterm Final Presentation Paper online discussions and attendance grades. Easy class just study really well for the tests. She requires you to buy a course pack BUT I never even opened mine and still got a B. no need to really buy it.

She is an awesome teacher, extremely helpful,and understanding. Unlike most teachers she is more than willing to work with you, and appears to really care about you and your grades. She makes the material enjoyable and fun. I would totally recommend taking her class. I wish there were more teachers like her at KSU

She is really helpful and available for consultation all the time. She knows the material and makes learning it easy. She posts powerpoints, gives review guides and the tests, quizzes and midterms are identical to the review guides. If you just do your work, like a student should, you'll make an A.

Knowledgeable on the subject matter, used great video clips from youtube to show application of theories taught. Great teacher that challenges students with intensive writing assignments. At the end of her class you will learn a lot.
Great teacher, willing to work with you. Attendance is mandatory but it won't kill you if you don't go everyday. Test are difficult if you don't study; mostly short answer.
she is a kindness professor. more experience in teaching!we all like her class.
She is a good professor! She has a good teaching skill and well-knowledge! She is kindness! I really appreciate that I am so lucky to meet so a nice instructor. We all love her！
So nice,so kind professor
very kind
everything is good and thanks for her helpful assistance in contacting with GA Dept. of Aducation. our group love you very much
She is so nice and her course is helpful. I like all the case studies.
very nice professor!
the passionate personal style, considerate guiding, and practical case study, and helpful assistance in contacting with GA Dept. of Aducation. our group love you very much
helpful for the lecture outlines; practical in case study; instructive in class study
Her class is very wonderful!
she is very professional.
Wonderful instruction and great charm.
Her course is very perfect,I love her class.
you are soooo... kind, thank you for your help. all of us love you.
kind, professional. we love her

Dear Dr. Seelarbokus, you are so kind, nice and warm-hearted to us not only in the class but also after the class. All the Chinese students like you so much. This semester will go to the end, we all hope that you and your family can have a wonderful winter vocation~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
perfect and very kind
she cares about students
she is knowledgeable and has many working experiences.
nice lady,theoraticlal teaching with field work experience
So nice professor!
kind, professional, all of us love her
great
She is kind and love students. She can understand students well. We all love her.
